summary: Harvard in the 1960's: a time of social upheaval and student unrest. Three students bond together, challenge the system and begin to lose their ideals.
cast: Brad Davis|Karen Allen|Jameson Parker|Shelley Long|John Friedrich|Gary Springer|Craig Richard Nelson|Harry Caesar|Nan Martin|Daniel Stern|Jason Laskay|Jamie Squire|Mary Margaret Amato|David Hollander|Frank Rich|Pamela Cresant|Severn Darden|Nick Cairis|Johnathan Moore|Nancy Penoyer|Deborah Offner|John Peters|Jeannetta Arnette|Donn Bennett|William N. Chamberlain|Jeffrey Corazzini|Russ Dupont|Ray Greenfield|Samson X. Greiff|Joe La Creta|Amy Leitman|Doug Llewelyn|Annie McGuire|Navabeh|Peter Pollard|Lawrence Chevis Prince|William J. Sahlein|Anita Sangiolo|Michael Shaunessy|Doree Sitterly|Brett G. Smith|David Tomaras|Robert Underwood|David K. Colapinto|Jon Hopwood|Lyndon B. Johnson|Thomas Massengale|Don Charles McGovern|Richard Nixon
title: Pequeño círculo de amigos
